text: hello and welcome to this tutorial today
we will build this chat summarizer with
the help of kohir AI
here you can see a conversation between
an AI support agent and a customer
with the help of our small program we
can just summarize the entire
conversation in one simple sentence like
you can see here
I highly recommend checking out the
kohir website for more information and
documentation about their API
okay so let's get started first I
created a new file called summary.pi in
this file let's import the cohere client
library and create a new client with our
own API key you can find your API key on
the cohere dashboard
next let's create a response object and
call generate on the cohere client
we will choose the model large for this
example and you can find more
information about different model sizes
on the cohere website
next let's call The Prompt and pass in
two examples of a summarize dialog so
right here you can see the summary
of this dialogue at the top
next let's pass in our new chat that
hasn't been summarized yet right here
you can see it the tldr is empty
then let's pass on a few more parameters
you can choose these to your needs
and then let's pass in a stop sequence
right here this stop sequence tells the
AI
to stop generating when exactly this
sequence is reached so for example right
here you can see that this sequence is
always at the end of the summary
at the end let's print out our
prediction
now we can check if our program works by
executing the python file
you can use the summarizer to summarize
conversations for example on slack
Discord telegram or emails if you're
interested in AI check out lab Lab AI to
find hackathons to participate in
like these ones
you can also find more tutorials on our
tutorial page
thank you for watching this cohere
tutorial have a wonderful day
